instruction: Help a reader to purchase a good laptop by providing reviews for the 2 most popular laptops.
input: The 2 most popular laptops: Dell XPS 13, HP Envy 13
output:
The Dell XPS 13 is a great laptop for its price range. It has a sleek and lightweight design, a long-lasting battery, a vivid display and powerful performance. It comes with Windows 10, 8GB of RAM and a 256GB solid-state drive. Furthermore, the laptop is available in various configurations to meet the needs of different users.

The HP Envy 13 is a high-end laptop with a premium design. It has an impressive 1080p display, fast 8th generation Intel Core processors and 8GB of RAM. It also offers a good battery life and a solid-state drive offering speeds up to 512GB. The laptop is great for gaming as well, with an NVIDIA GeForce MX150 graphics card.
